body: I feel like shit after watching this. I hope it gets translated soon so i can feel like shit again after reading this.
Now i wonder where did i saw this kind of shit, so it's half assed school days with less blood...

@RedHawk01 No, the girl in glasses only has had two sex partners...the MC and the guy with the light hair. What she broke down about was realizing she loved the MC too much to forget about him. That light haired guy(who was also the one they worked with over the summer) said something exactly the same way the MC said it to her earlier(which she has saved on her phone as an audio file...)...this made her remember him and made her break down. People are confusing the two different girls the MC has been with...and the guys those girls have been with. :/
This is a good series, hope it gets translated soon, this is like chitose  with more ppl involved and more content, ppl picking this up late stfu
Bit too late for buyers remorse now bitch.

So from what I understand from @Ehbm92 and @blabervin671 she date with an another guy other than mc but she did it with him (why?) but now she also do that  with an another guy (is it a random guy ?) and at the end of that she realized all what she did to mc and  feel like a crap and now she want to get back to mc . Is it correct ? 
If this is correct, it’s a fucking shit .
Only read this chapter by curiosity and it seem like a shit .
One of the best doujin here!!!
@ehm92 mind explaining what happened last chapter plz?

Not really ntr here though... She's not dating the other dude. He was dating someone else so she was getting it elsewhere. Pretty straight forward, she just realizes she can't keep at it like this and she feels like crap for using this dude, the whole time.
The Mc did get ntred by that other girl though, she was a hoe with hoe logic, it was funny that she seemed to pop out of the hoe logic at the end. 
So did his friend by the other hoe, the store owner.
the characters and story is so dumb. Not sure what happened but when does the NTR stop holy shit. Ending seems like it will stop but i swear if anything happens again imma lose it.
She fucks the guy, then she remembers MC, then after fucking the guy breaks up with the guy to go back to MC. What the fuck is with this shit
